The Modern ERP for Growing Businesses

ERP-MAS is an open-source, modular ERP system designed for flexibility and scalability, integrated with advanced AI capabilities.

Finance & Accounting
Manage your general ledger, accounts payable/receivable, and financial reporting.
Sales & CRM
Track leads, manage customer relationships, and streamline your sales pipeline.
Inventory Management
Optimize stock levels, manage warehouses, and track inventory movements.
HR Management
Handle employee records, payroll, and recruitment processes with ease.

AI-Powered Insights

Leverage the power of a Multi-Agent System (MAS) and Knowledge-Graph-based RAG (KG-RAG) for intelligent automation and decision-making.

Intelligent Automation

Automate complex business processes using autonomous agents that collaborate to achieve goals.

Conversational Knowledge Access

Ask complex questions in natural language and get precise answers from your structured and unstructured data.

Predictive Analytics

Forecast sales, predict inventory needs, and identify business trends with AI-driven analytics.
